pkmkdoc.description:
OpenEmu.app, all supported emulator cores, and the scaling filters are installed by default. To install the Quartz Composer plugins, click Customize on the third page of this installer, and select "Quartz Composer plugins" under "Other".
Open Emu runs on OS X 10.5 and higher. Quartz Composer is required to use the Quartz Composer plugins: get it from the Developer Tools installer on your system install disc or download them from developer.apple.com.

choice.title: CrabEmu (SMS)
choice.description: Crab Emu emulates the Sega Master System, Game Gear and SG-1000. See http://crabemu.sourceforge.net/ for more info.

choice.title: Nestopia (NES)
choice.description: Nestopia emulates the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES). See http://nestopia.sourceforge.net/ for more info.

choice.title: GensGS (Genesis)
choice.description: Gens/GS emulates the Sega Genesis, 32x (Unsupported) and Sega CD. See http://info.sonicretro.org/Gens/GS for more info.

choice.title: SNES9x (SNES)
choice.description: SNES9x emulates the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES). See http://www.snes9x.com/ for more info.

choice.title: Gambatte (GB)
choice.description: Gambatte emulates the Nintendo Gameboy and Gameboy Color. See http://sourceforge.net/projects/gambatte/ for more info.

choice.title: VisualBoyAdvance (GBA)
choice.description: VisualBoyAdvance emulates the Nintendo Gameboy Advance. See http://vba-m.ngemu.com/ for more info.

choice.title: Quartz Composer plugins
choice.description: OpenEmuQC loads all supported cores, OpenEmuQCNES loads Nestopia, including extended features, and OpenEmuQCFilters contains the GPU-accelerated scaling filters, which can be used with any image input -- not just OpenEmuQC*.

choice.title: Video Filters
choice.description: GPU-accelerated scaling filters by Pete Bernert, ported by vade. See http://www.pbernert.com/html/gpu.htm#SHADER for more info.
